# Generated by "yarp cmake"

# A cmake file to get started with for new YARP projects.
# It assumes you want to build an executable from source code in 
# the current directory.
# Replace "yarpy" with whatever your executable should be called.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.7)

set(KEYWORD "icubsee")

# Start a project.
project(${KEYWORD})

# Find YARP.  Point the YARP_DIR environment variable at your build.
find_package(YARP REQUIRED)
find_package(ICUB)
find_package( OpenCV REQUIRED )
list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ${YARP_MODULE_PATH})
list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ${ICUB_MODULE_PATH})
list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR})
include(YarpInstallationHelpers)

find_package(ICUBcontrib)
list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ${ICUBCONTRIB_MODULE_PATH})
include(ICUBcontribHelpers)
include(ICUBcontribOptions)
icubcontrib_set_default_prefix()

# Search for source code.
source_group("Source Files" FILES src/icubsee.cpp)



# Inclue any directories needed for YARP
include_directories(${YARP_INCLUDE_DIRS} ${ICUB_INCLUDE_DIRS} ${OpenCV_INCLUDE_DIRS})

# Set up our main executable.

add_executable(${KEYWORD} src/icubsee.cpp)
target_link_libraries(${KEYWORD} ${OpenCV_LIBRARIES} ${YARP_LIBRARIES})
install(TARGETS ${PROJECTNAME} DESTINATION bin)
icubcontrib_add_uninstall_target()

########## application
#file(GLOB conf_ini ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/conf/*.ini)
#yarp_install(FILES ${KEYWORD}.xml DESTINATION ${ICUBCONTRIB_CONTEXTS_INSTALL_DIR}/${KEYWORD})

add_subdirectory(app)
